headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot:  Tom Waits Cat and Facebook Stock Promotion

docs.snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes Facebook's online promotional road show for its coming stock offering and a variation on the Nyan Cat video, f...
docs.abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes Facebook's online promotional road show for its coming stock offering and a variation on the Nyan Cat video, featuring the musician Tom Waits.
